ygData.subject: Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats a good idea.  I m certain that with either my charm or my cash, someone will let me loot the Guise.  My main concern though is not getting killed while
ygData.messageBody:
Thats a good idea. I'm certain that with either my charm or my cash,
someone will let me loot the Guise. My main concern though is not getting
killed while I'm down there. Any suggestions on how a 24 bard can pull this
off?

Galtin of E'ci

> Step number one, if you get down there and a group is camping the mob that
> drops the guise
> (Assassin? I don't remember) is to just ask if they would mind if you
> looted it. Be creative,
> offer to sing them a song or something in exchange for it.
>
> Chances are, they're nice people who all have masks anyway and just want
> to pull Serrated Bone
> Dirks and they'll happily let you loot the mask if you entertain them.
>
> If they're jerks about it, then offer to pay. If it was my group though,
> we'd happily let you
> loot it for free.
>
> Jyzan
>
>
